triples.name: Deep reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: The paper analyzes DRL algorithms used in strategy games and their handling of invalid actions.

triples.name: Policy gradient method
triples.relevance: Policy gradient algorithms are the primary focus of the paper's investigation into action masking.

triples.name: Strategy video game
triples.relevance: Strategy games serve as the evaluation domain for testing action masking in DRL agents.

triples.name: Action selection
triples.relevance: The paper proposes and analyzes action masking as a constraint mechanism for valid action selection in policy gradient algorithms.
